org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl

Class LTLRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLRandom

  • public class LTLRandom
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can randomly generate LTL formulae.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LTLRandom.Policy
      Enumeration of policies.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_LENGTH
      The default formula length.
      static boolean DEFAULT_MUST_CONTAIN_PAST
      Indicates if the formula must contain at least one past operator.
      static boolean DEFAULT_NNF
      Indicates if the formula is in negation normal form.
      static boolean DEFAULT_OUTMOST_FUTURE
      Indicates if the out-most operator is a future operator.
      static LTLRandom.Policy DEFAULT_POLICY
      The default generation policy.
      static int DEFAULT_PROPOSITION_SIZE
      The default number of propositions.
      static boolean DEFAULT_REPEAT
      Indicates if a formula can be generated more than once.
      static int DEFAULT_SPIN
      The default value of outputting formulae that can be accepted by SPIN.
      static int DEFAULT_WEIGHT_BOOLEAN
      The default weight of boolean operators.
      static int DEFAULT_WEIGHT_FUTURE
      The default weight of future operators.
      static int DEFAULT_WEIGHT_PAST
      The default weight of past operators.

      Generates a random LTL formula.

      Sets the length of generated formulae.

      Sets the weights of occurrence possibilities of boolean operators, future operators, and past operators.

        public void setWeight(int bool,
                      int future,
                      int past)
        Sets the weights of occurrence possibilities of boolean operators, future operators, and past operators.
        Parameters:
        bool - the weight of boolean operators
        future - the weight of future operators
        past - the weight of past operators
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if bool, future, and past are all smaller than 0

      • random

        public LTL random()
        Generates a random LTL formula.
        Returns:
        a LTL formula
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the formula length is not long enough when the policy is Policy#AtLeastOnce or Policy#ExactOnce
